job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongDesired Skills and Experiencenbspstrongpp5 years of experience as a Software Engineer with a focus in Middleware technologies NO FrontEndppExtensive experienceknowledge of implementing and managing multithreaded processes using CNET or CppExperience developing interactive APIs writing librariesDDL and working with Windows ServicesppExperience with background processing and integrating any type of hardwaredeviceppbrppbrppstrongPlussesstrongppExperience with Retails Sales systems or POS pointofsale systemsdevicesppbrppbrppstrongDaytoDaynbspstrongpulliA client is looking for a Software Engineer CNET to join their team in Philadelphia PA Heshe will be supporting the Mobile Device Management applications and the Enterprise Portal This team manages retail sales systems that are used on over 10000 devices across the country ie PointofSale devices This role will heavily involve middleware technology multithreading and Windows Services for communication between the hardwaresoftware Additionally heshe will be programming in CNET and conducting basic testingliul
